required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of a Single Oral Dose of Moxidectin on the Cardiac QT Interval of Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study to Evaluate the Potential Effect of a Single Oral Dose of Moxidectin on the Cardiac QT Interval of Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock:
This study will investigate the effect of a single oral dose of moxidectin on the QT interval associated with moxidectin plasma concentrations.
The effect of moxidectin on other ECG intervals, and on safety, will also be assessed, as will preliminary pharmacokinetics and metabolism

detailed_description.textblock:
Moxidectin is being developed as a treatment for Onchocerciasis (river blindness), a serious, debilitating, disease caused by a parasitic worm, Onchocerca volvulus.
Five dose levels of moxidectin will be administered to healthy volunteers and ECG assessments undertaken at pre-specified pharmacokinetic time points to correlate QT interval with moxidectin concentration in plasma.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: ECG intervals in subjects receiving a single dose of moxidectin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and at 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12*, 24, 36, 48, 60, and 72 hours post dosing, and on Days 8, 15, and 22.
Pre-dose and 0 to 24, 24 to 48, and 48 to 72 hours post dose
Pre-dose and 0 to 24, 24 to 48, and 48 to 72 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as assessed by occurrence of adverse events (AE)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to end of study (At 12 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: All AE occurring during the study will be recorded

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as assessed by changes in laboratory results
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Baseline and Days 2, 3, 4, 22 and Week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as assessed by changes in physical examination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Baseline and Days 1, 2, 3, 4, 8, 15, 22 and Week 12
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in physical examination findings including vital signs (heart rate, blood pressure, respiratory rate, temperature)

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety as assessed by changes in 12-lead electrocardiograms (ECGs).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At Baseline and Days 1, 2, 3, 4, 22 and Week 12

arm_group.description: 10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of moxidectin 4mg
10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of moxidectin 8mg
10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of moxidectin 16mg
10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of moxidectin 24mg
10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of moxidectin 36mg
10 subjects will receive a single oral dose of placebo

patient_data.ipd_description: Healthy volunteer study: results are not useful to individuals
